objects.description: [eSurv](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0507) has been distributed via phishing websites with geo-restrictions that allow access to only Italian and Turkmenistani mobile carriers. [eSurv](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0507) can install applications via malicious iOS provisioning profiles containing the developer’s certificate.(Citation: Lookout eSurv)

external_references.description: A. Bauer. (2019, April 8). Lookout discovers phishing sites distributing new iOS and Android surveillanceware. Retrieved September 11, 2020.
